title: Civil Service Academy, Health Services Academy forge strategic partnership for healthier future
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 30 (APP): The Civil Service Academy (CSA), Lahore and the Health Services Academy (HSA) have formalized a collaboration through signing of a Memorandum of Understanding.
Director General CSA, Lahore Farhan Aziz Khawaja and Vice Chancellor HSA Prof. Dr. Shahzad Ali Khan signed the accord that aims at capacity-building of civil servants to foster innovation, research, sustainable development, healthy aging and preventive care.
The objective of the MoU is to drive an impactful change and advance public health initiatives in the country.
